summary: This document is a declaration by Denise Johannes, the custodian of records for the Office of the Lieutenant Governor, affirming the receipt of a Grand Jury Subpoena dated August 7, 2019. The declaration certifies the authenticity of the records provided in response to the subpoena, in accordance with federal rules of evidence.

persons.name: Denise Johannes
persons.context: Denise Johannes declares her position as the custodian of records and affirms the authenticity of the records in response to a Grand Jury Subpoena.

persons.name: Alison Moe
persons.context: Alison Moe is mentioned as the signatory of the Grand Jury Subpoena requesting records.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena Issued
events.description: A Grand Jury Subpoena was issued requesting specified records from the Office of the Lieutenant Governor.

events.title: Declaration Executed
events.description: Denise Johannes executed a declaration affirming the receipt of the Grand Jury Subpoena and the authenticity of the records provided.

keyFacts: Denise Johannes is the custodian of records for the Office of the Lieutenant Governor.
The Grand Jury Subpoena was dated August 7, 2019.
The declaration was executed on August 13, 2019.
Alison Moe is the Assistant United States Attorney who signed the subpoena.
The records were certified as authentic and made in the regular course of business.
